save.dataNull: The Accept Input shall not be empty
save.extraDataNull: The Accept Extra Input shall not be empty
save.dataError: The Accept Input only decimal number between 0 to 8, and the most fine cut to 1 after the decimal point
save.dataExtraError: The Accept Extra Input only decimal number between 2 to 8, and the most fine cut to 1 after the decimal point
save.dayDataMax: The Accept Input cannot be greater than 8 hours a day
save.dataChanged: Record have been changed,please reopen the save operation
save.holiday: The Accept Input/The Accept Extra Input of Holiday [{{param}}] only to 0
save.overDay: The Accept Input of Tomorrow and after only to 0
save.overInput: The Accept Input is not allowed to be greater than the Real Input
save.overExtraInput: The Accept Extra Input of Tomorrow and after only to 0
save.inputZeroCheck: The Real Input is 0, and the Accept Input is only to 0
save.extraInputZeroCheck: The Extra Input is 0, and the Accept Extra Input is only to 0
